If you’ve ever dreamed of having a truly autonomous AI pair programmer that doesn’t just suggest lines of code but actively edits files, runs commands, and debugs your code ‚Äî your wish has come true.

üí° What is Copilot Agent Mode?

Agent Mode is a major upgrade to GitHub Copilot.
